\bigskip{}
\textbf{\Large{Education}} \smallskip \hrule \medskip

{\bf PhD in Electrical and Computer Engineering} \hfill {05/2003 \textendash{} 12/2009} \\
Georgia Institute of Technology, Atlanta, GA \\
\emph{Dissertation:} Support Vector Classification Analysis of Resting State Functional Connectivity fMRI \\
\emph{Specializations:} MR Physics, Bioengineering, and Digital Signal Processing,
\emph{Minor:} Mathematics

{\bf MS in Electrical and Computer Engineering} \hfill {01/2001 \textendash{} 05/2003} \\
Georgia Institute of Technology, Atlanta, GA \\
\emph{Specializations:} Bioengineering and Digital Signal Processing,
\emph{Minor:} Mathematics

{\bf Bachelor of Computer Engineering} \hfill {06/1995 \textendash{} 08/1999} \\
Georgia Institute of Technology, Atlanta, GA \\
\emph{Specializations:} Telecommunications and Digital Signal Processing

\textbf{\Large{Experience}} \smallskip \hrule \medskip

{\bf Director, Image Analysis and Informatics Core and Associate Professor} \hfill {10/2017 \textendash{} current} \\
Department of Diagnostic Medicine,\\
Dell Medical School, The University of Texas at Autin, Austin, Tx\\

{\bf Director, Computational Neuroimaging Lab} \hfill {08/2014 \textendash{} 09/2017} \\
Center for Biomedical Imaging and Neuromodulation,\\
Nathan S. Kline Institute for Psychiatric Research, Orangeburg, NY


{\bf Director of Imaging} \hfill {07/2012 \textendash{} 09/2017} \\
Center for the Developing Brain and the Healthy Brain Network,\\
Child Mind Institute, Inc., New York, NY

{\bf Research Scientist VI} \hfill {10/2012 \textendash{} 11/2015} \\
Research Foundation for Mental Health, Inc.,\\
Nathan S. Kline Institute for Psychiatric Research, Orangeburg, NY

%\newpage{}
{\bf Postdoctoral Associate} \hfill {10/2010 \textendash{} 06/2012} \\
Virginia Tech Carilion Research Institute, Roanoke, VA

{\bf Research Associate} \hfill {10/2009 \textendash{} 10/2010} \\
Computational Psychiatry Unit, Department of Neuroscience\\
Baylor College of Medicine, Houston, TX

{\bf Supervising Research Specialist} \hfill {01/2007 \textendash{} 10/2009} \\
Department of Psychiatry and Behavioral Sciences\\
Emory University School of Medicine, Atlanta, GA

{\bf Guest Researcher} \hfill {06/2004 \textendash{} 01/2007} \\
Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, Atlanta, GA

{\bf Research Assistant} \hfill {11/2001 \textendash{} 05/2004} \\
School of Electrical and Computer Engineering, Georgia Institute of Technology, Atlanta, GA

{\bf Engineer} \hfill {01/2000 \textendash{} 09/2001} \\
Opuswave Networks Inc., Colorado Springs, CO

{\bf Junior Systems Engineer} \hfill {08/1998 \textendash{} 12/1998} \\
Lucent Technologies Product Realization Center, Atlanta, GA

{\bf Stokes Undergraduate Scholar} \hfill {08/1995 \textendash{} 12/1999} \\
Central Intelligence Agency, Washington DC
